ValidationRule.description: Validates client review required field when status is from define to design.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) ) = 'Define' , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Design'), ISPICKVAL( Client_Review_Required__c , 'None') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that the “Client Review Required” field is either N/A or Client Approved , before moving the status to Design.
